Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Devil Gigatron tilts his head as Iron Raptor speaks and as soon as she 
finished his head moves back to looking straight at her.

Devil Gigatron: "It doesn't matter what you or his name is! As far as im 
concerned you both could be big, heaping, stinking piles of sentient monkey 
crap calling yourselves Bob and Boob! What Devil Gigatron does care about is 
what happens to the future and from the looks of things there, you jabronies 
seem to be doing one hell of a shitty job."

--part1_114.305ea50.28a80e96_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
